passive_skill.name: Thundering Aura
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +4 and ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) High chance of evading enemy's attack; (Forever) Randomly changes INT Ki Spheres to Ki Spheres of another Type; When receiving an attack: Survives K.O. attacks (up to once within a turn); When HP is 80% or more: DEF 100% up; When HP is 80% or less: Changes Ki Spheres: PHY to STR; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 100% up; An additional ATK & DEF 50% up when HP is 80% or less; With a STR or PHY Ki Sphere obtained: Launches 2 additional Super Attacks; For every STR or PHY Ki Sphere obtained: ATK 40% up; Chance of performing a critical hit 10% up; With an AGL, TEQ or INT Ki Sphere obtained: Guards all attacks; For every AGL, TEQ or INT Ki Sphere obtained: ATK & DEF 20% up; Chance of evading enemy's attack 5% up
